As soon as you open it, it asks for your phone number. They are taking your information. I don’t like that. Trump also kicked out one direction from one of his hotel when they didn’t say hi to his daughter and THEY WHERE SLEEPING!! anyways treat people with kindness 🧚🏼✨🧚🏼 except trump 🧚🏼✨🧚🏼 Verse 1]
[Liam]
You're insecure,
Don't know what for,

Don't need make-up,
To cover up,
Being the way that you are is enough,
[Bridge]
[Harry]
Everyone else in the room can see it,
Everyone else but you,
[Chorus]
[All]
Baby you light up my world like nobody else,
The way that you flip your hair gets me overwhelmed,
But when you smile at the ground it ain't hard to tell,
You don't know,
Oh oh,
You don't know you're beautiful,
If only you saw what I can see,
You'll understand why I want you so desperately,
Right now I'm looking at you and I can't believe,
You don't know,
Oh oh,
You don't know you're beautiful,
Oh oh,
That's what makes you beautiful

attributes.review: This app is so bad in many different ways.First of all there has been thousands of life’s that’s have been affected because of the like the Hispanic and black community.This has affected so many things and we have to help and stop it but this app should get deleted off this App Store now.🤢😡
attributes.title: So bad

attributes.review: This app is littered with pop up ads and viruses. Went to click on the button to text and an ad popped up that brought me to a website that was fake, trying to say I won an amazon gift card for free, you know, classic virus. Not to mention it takes forever to load, and it’s really buggy. Crashes all the time, and sometimes doesn’t even let me in the app. Please don’t download this app!
attributes.title: Be careful!!!!

attributes.review: This took 5 days to download 🤬  once it downloaded it gave me a virus ?? I got creepy messages such as “vote trump 2020” NO 👎 bad 😠 I felt so threaten and violated if it would’ve said vote anyone else 2020 (except Kanye west😜) and stuff like vote trump out 2020 yes 1000000 stars and a good review. Another issue when I first opened the app it showed an Orange man with corn hair ? WHY ? I don’t know it scared me anyone 11 and below would be frightened and not be able to sleep at night 😢 this app doesn’t consider EVERYONE 🤪 therefore 1 Star review . DO NOT I repeat DO NOT get this app it is bad for ur health and frightens YOU and little kids 😒 stay safe y’all 😚💕💯🙏👀
